0.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side is a majestic sight to behold.  You can
see out over the ocean surrounding Pharsica for miles.  The crashing waves
of the sea slam and explode into the side of the cliff far below.  It looks
like a long drop from here to the sea below.  The trail along the cliff side
continues to the southeast.  The Shoal Narrows of Oldport can be found through
the gates to the west.

1.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side continues to the south and northwest.  The
tall stone walls surrounding the city of Oldport tower above you.  Looking out
to the east and across the ocean surrounding Pharsica, it is truly a beautiful
sight to behold.  The waters are still a ways down, but you can see the waves
cresting and foaming from here.  The cliff face below takes quite a beating
from the continual crashing of the relentless ocean.  Thankfully the resilient
rock seems up to the battle.

2.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side continues to the north and southwest.  The
tall stone walls surrounding the city of Oldport tower above you.  Looking out
to the east and across the ocean surrounding Pharsica, it is truly a beautiful
sight to behold.  The waters are still a ways down, but you can see the waves
cresting and foaming from here.  The cliff face below takes quite a beating
from the continual crashing of the relentless ocean.  Thankfully the resilient
rock seems up to the battle.

3.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side continues to the northeast and southwest.
You cling tightly to the cliff side, hoping not fall of the ledge and plunge
into the ocean below.  It is still quite a ways down to the water from here.
The ocean surrounding Pharsica is truly beautiful from here.  It goes all the
way out to meet the horizon.  Looking up the cliff face, you can see the
stone walls surrounding the city of Oldport climb to the heavens.  The city
looks very well fortified from here.

4.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side continues to the northeast and also takes
a scary dip down from here.  It looks like about a ten foot climb down from
here.  You better climb down carefully or you might wind up splashing into
the ocean below.  That would be quite a drop!

5.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   There is a short climb up the trail along the cliff side from here.  It
looks like it is only about ten feet or so.  You better hold your grip
tight so that you do now tumble down the cliff face and into the sea below.
The trail along the cliff side continues to the south.

6.name: A Trail Along the Cliff Side
desc: "   The trail along the cliff side comes to an end and gives way to the start
of some sand dunes to the southeast.  The sand looks soft and inviting.  You
can almost feel the warmth of the sun emanating from the sand from here.  The
waves of the ocean surrounding Pharsica splash against the sides of the cliff
face and spray clouds of sea water directly in your face.  Smiling up at the
hot sun above, the misty refresher from the sea is a welcome change.

7.name: A Path Through the Sand
desc: "   The soft sand of the beach immediately sinks beneath your feet.  Your only
instinct is to take off your boots and sink your toes deep in the undoubtedly
warm sand.  The strong smell of salt water drifts through the air the closer
you get to the water.  Walking towards the end of the sand to the east, it
would not be a long jump into the water from here.  However, the waters look
entire to dangerous, as the rolling waves crash into the sand with an explosion
of water.  Looking up the cliff side to the west, you can see the towering
walls surrounding the city of Oldport.  That place appears to be well fortified!
The beach continues to the southwest while the path around the cliff can be
found to the northwest.

8.name: A Path Through the Sand
desc: "   The soft sand of the beach immediately sinks beneath your feet as you walk
along the path towards the water.  You could think of nothing better than to
rip off your boots and plunging your toes and feet deep within the warm sand.
Reaching down to touch the sand, you see shells in whole and some crushed to
pieces.  The outskirts of the sand are blocked off by thick patches of weeds
and cattails.  It would be impossible to get into the water of the ocean
surrounding Pharsica from here.  Looking up into the sky, you can see seagulls
starting to circle high above.  There must be people or at least food fairly
close to here.  The sandy path through the beach continues to the northeast
and southwest.

13.name: A Path Through the Sand
desc: "   The full beach is finally in sight to the south.  The beach area is huge!
It looks like it goes on for a mile at least.  It looks like there are a ton
of people all along the beach, enjoying themselves and relaxing under the
radiant sun.  Maybe you should go join them!  The sandy path through the
beach continues to the south and norhteast.

14.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites growing
up from the floor.  It is obvious that this place has been here a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  There is a mass of vines covering the wall to the south.  It looks
like you can open the vines just like a sheet of curtains.  The tunnel through
the mountain continues to the north.

15.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The beach is teeming with life and energy.  There are beach goer's camped
out and walking all throughout the soft warm sand of the beach.  It looks like
a perfect day to take off all your armor, whip out a towel and relax along the
beach with them.  The sounds of seagulls squawking high above pierce your ears
as they circle the beach looking for their next meal.  The salty smell of the
ocean water is getting stronger the further you move along the beach.  The end of
the beach and entry to the water is a ways off to the south.  The sandy beach
continues to the west, south and east.  A sandy trail along the cliff face
can be found directly to the north.

16.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The beach comes to an abrupt end in a small alcove.  The weeds and cattails
have completely blocked any kind of access to the ocean surrounding Pharsica to
the east.  Looking out over the ocean, it is a breath-taking sight to behold.
You can see all the way to the horizon from here.  It looks completely serene
and blissful.  The sand beneath your feet is soft and warm.  You can even feel
the heat through your boots.  It would probably feel great just to take off
your boots and sink your toes deep into the sand.  The sandy beach continues
to the west.

17.name: Beneath the Cliff Face
desc: "   The beach comes to a sudden stop at the cliff face.  The cliff looks
extremely rigid and steep, impossible to climb from here.  There are vibrant
green vines growing all the way up the mountain.  Flowers of assorted colors
bloom all along the vines.  Grabbing onto the vines to see if they might
help you climb up the cliff face, they simply break off and fall limp into
your hand.  Looking far up the cliff face, you can see the strong and mighty
walls surrounding the city of Oldport.  That place looks pretty impenetrable
from here.  The sandy beach continues to the west, south and east.

23.name: Beneath the Cliff Face
desc: "   The beach comes to a sudden stop at the cliff face.  The cliff looks
extremely rigid and steep, impossible to climb from here.  There are vibrant
green vines growing all the way up the mountain.  This section of vines looks
a little different from the others.  It is like a curtain of vines covers
this part of the cliff face, almost begging to be opened.  How strange.
Flowers of assorted colors bloom all along the vines.  They really are quite
lovely and smell very fragrant.  Looking far up the cliff face, you can see
the strong and mighty walls surrounding the city of Oldport.  That place looks
pretty impenetrable from here.  The sandy beach continues to the west, south

28.name: Beneath the Cliff Face
desc: "   The beach comes to a sudden stop to the north, west and south.  The cliff
face that supports the city of Oldport lies directly tot he north.  Looking
up to the top of the cliff, you can see gigantic and strong looking walls
defending Oldport.  They look to be nearly impenetrable from here.  The
west and south are blocked by some tall and pretty cattails and weeds.  You
can look out over the weeds to see the ocean surrounding Pharsica.  It seems
to go out to meet the horizon.  The sandy beach continues to the east.

29.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The beach is lively with excitement and fun.  You can see beach goer's
having their time in almost every corner of the beach.  This place is packed!
The large cliff holding up the city of Oldport can be found a short distance
to the northwest.  There are some tall and pretty cattails and weeds blocking
any further movement to the east and south.  You can look out over the weeds
to see the ocean surrounding the island of Pharsica.  It seems to go out to
meet the horizon.  The sandy beach continues to the north and west.

30.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The beach is jumping with fun and excitement in every direction.  You can
see people relaxing, sunning, laughing and generally having a good time in
nearly every corner of the beach.  This place is packed.  The large cliff
holding up the city of Oldport can be found a short distance to the north.
The sounds of sea gulls squawking can be heard high above you in the air.
They seem to be circling, hoping the someone will drop a scrap of food
for them to grab.  The sandy beach continues to the north, east, south
and west.

41.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The sandy beach is brimming with joy and excitement in every direction.  No
matter where you look there are people sunning, laughing, relaxing and generally
having a really great time.  This beach is packed to the hilts!  Looking to
the north, you can see the large cliff supporting the city of Oldport.  Even
from here the cliff looks huge and it is still a good distance to the north.
There are patches of cattails and weeds blocking any access to the east.  You
can look out over the weeds and see the ocean surrounding the island of Pharsica.
The ocean seems to go our forever, it tries to embrace the horizon like good
friends.  The sandy beach continues to the north, west and south.

42.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   Geez, this beach is packed today.  It seems that you cannot take a few steps
without stepping on someone or something.  The beach goer's are having the time
of their lives.  They are all laughing, sunning, relaxing and generally enjoying
themselves.  Looking up in the sky, you can see sea gulls flapping their wings
through the air.  They circle the beach like vultures, hoping one of the beach
goer's will drop a morsel of food.  Animals!  The gigantic cliff holding up
the city of Oldport just a short distance to the north.  The ocean surrounding
Pharsica can be walked into in the distance to the south.  The sandy beach
continues to the north, east, south and west.

the north, you can see the large cliff supporting the city of Oldport.  Even
from here the cliff looks huge and it is still a good distance to the north.
There are patches of cattails and weeds blocking any access to the west.  You
can look out over the weeds and see the ocean surrounding the island of Pharsica.
The ocean seems to go our forever, it tries to embrace the horizon like good
friends.  The sandy beach continues to the north, east and south.

51.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The sandy beach is covered with people, blankets and umbrellas.  The beach
goer's all seem to be having the time of their lives.  You have never seen
larger smiles or heard louder laughs coming from all over the beach.  Loud
squawking from the sky forces you to look up.  The sky is covered in sea gulls
circling the beach like giant vultures.  Random gulls swoop down from the sky
every now and again, scooping up any piece of food someone has dropped in the sand.
The radiant sun beams are getting so hot that all you want to do is run further
south to the end of the beach and jump in the refreshing water.  Sounds like
a good plan.  Looking in the distance to the north, the gigantic cliffs
supporting Oldport reach up into the sky.  The sandy beach continues to the
north, south, east and west.

52.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The beach comes to an end in a quiet alcove.  The sand dunes rise from the
beach and block any further travel to the east.  Covered in lovely cattails and
annoying weeds, the sand dunes can be climbed a ways to see over the ocean
surrounding Pharsica.  The excitement and sounds people enjoying the beach
can be heard coming from the west.  Perhaps you should join them!

63.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   Large sand dunes rise from the beach and block any further travel to the
east and south.  The sand dunes are covered in lovely cattails and clumpy
weeds that only add to the atheistic of the beach.  Climbing up the dunes
a short way, you can look out over the ocean surrounding Pharsica.  It is
truly a beautiful sight to behold.  The ocean flows all the way to the horizon
and folds into its embrace.  The joyful and excited sounds of the beach goer's
can be heard coming from the north and west.

64.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The sandy beach has never seen a busier day in its long existence.  Every
inch of the beach is covered in people, blankets and large beach umbrellas.
All the beach goer's seem to be having the times of their lives.  You have
never seen people having more fun or enjoying themselves relaxing.  Maybe
you should join them?  The cliff supporting the city of Oldport is starting
to appear over the top of the beach to the north.  The entry into the cool
and refreshing water of the ocean surrounding Pharsica is a short distance
to the south.  The sandy beach continues to the north, east, south and west.

72.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   Large sand dunes rise from the beach and block any further travel to the
west and south.  The sand dunes are covered in lovely cattails and clumpy
weeds that only add to the atheistic of the beach.  Climbing up the dunes
a short way, you can look out over the ocean surrounding Pharsica.  It is
truly a beautiful sight to behold.  The ocean flows all the way to the horizon

73.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The shoreline of the Oldport beach is very relaxing.  The water ebbs and
wanes as the tide moves the waves along the ocean.  Water splashes on your
boots as you walk along the sandy shore.  The ocean to the south looks
extremely calm.  You could probably walk right into the water.  It looks
cool and refreshing, a nice contrast to the sun beating down on you from above.
Looking to the north, you can see beach goer's laid out and walking all over
the beach.  They all seem to be relaxing and enjoying themselves on this
bright and sunny day.  The shoreline continues to the west and the sandy
beach crawls up to the north.

74.name: Along the Sandy Beach
desc: "   The shoreline of the Oldport beach is very relaxing.  The water ebbs and
wanes as the tide moves the waves along the ocean.  Water splashes on your
boots as you walk along the sandy shore.  The ocean to the south looks
extremely calm.  You could probably walk right into the water.  It looks
cool and refreshing, a nice contrast to the sun beating down on you from above.
Looking to the north, you can see beach goer's laid out and walking all over

bright and sunny day.  The shoreline continues to the east and west.  The
sandy beach slowly crawls up to the north.

81.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites growing
up from the floor.  It is obvious that this place has been here a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  The tunnel takes a massive drop down from here.  You better hold onto
the stalagmites tightly or you may slip and fall!  The tunnel through the
mountain continues to the south and down.

82.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel through the mountain continues to the northeast and up.  The
ceiling is covered with stalactites and stalagmites grow up from the tunnel
floor.  It is obvious that this place has been here for a long time.  The
sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the tunnel.
Be careful climbing up the tunnel, the tunnel floors are wet and you could
fall.

83.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow
up from the floor.  It is obvious this place has been here for a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  You can also hear the sound of a running river coming from the
northeast.  The tunnel through the mountain continues to the northeast and
southwest.

84.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow
up from the floor.  It is obvious this place has been here for a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  You can also hear the sound of a running river coming from the
north.  The tunnel through the mountain continues to the north and
southeast.

extra.desc: Watch your step!  This is a narrow cliff!

85.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   Wow!  You almost fell into the river running through the mountain!  Barely
managing to hold your feet, you wobble back and forth carefully as pebbles from
the edge of the cliff fall into the water.  There is a good sized jump to
another cliff across the river.  You better be careful or you might fall in!
Of course, you could always jump into the river if you need a refreshing bath.
God only knows where it leads.  The tunnel through the mountain leads safely
to the south.

extra.desc: 1....2.....3....and jump!  Whew, you made is safely across the river.
**Sploosh!** Diving into the river the current quickly sweeps you to the east.

86.name: An Underwater River
desc: "   The underwater river is flowing quite quickly.  It is difficult to tell
where the water is coming from, but the current is quickly carrying you to
the east.  Holding onto the sides of the tunnel, you can barely keep yourself
in place.  It is probably best to just go with the flow.

extra.desc: With a deep breath, you emerge from the water and quickly climb up the cliff.

87.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow
up from the floor.  It is obvious this place has been here for a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  You can also hear the sound of a running river coming from the
south.  The tunnel through the mountain continues to the north and
south.

extra.desc: Watch your step!  This is a narrow cliff!

88.name: An Underwater River
desc: "   The underwater river is flowing quite quickly.  The current is moving you
to the south at a rapid pace.  Holding onto the sides of the tunnel, you can
barely keep yourself in place.  It is probably best to just go with the
flow of the river.

89.name: An Underwater River
desc: "   The underwater river is flowing even more quickly at this point.  Even
underwater, you can hear the rush of the water to the southeast shooting
into the air.  You are quickly pulled through this tunnel into the southeast.
There is no point resisting by holding onto the tunnel walls.  This current
is just too strong.

extra.desc: You emerge from the underwater river and fall down the waterfall.

90.name: A Small Lake in the Mountain
desc: "   The lake is a beautiful reprieve in this dark and dank series of tunnels
through the mountain.  The waterfall shoots out from the underwater river
above you to the northwest.  The water falls into a lake that has formed in
the middle of the room.  The lake is considerably large and looks like you
could easily enter and swim through it.  What could be in there?

extra.desc: *Sploosh*!  You swim up the waterfall and dive into the river.

91.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow
up from the floor.  It is obvious this place has been here for a long time.
The sound of water dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the
tunnel.  You can also hear the sound of running water coming from the tunnel
to the south.  The tunnel through the mountain continues to the east, west
and south.

92.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow
up from the floor.  It is obvious this place has been here for a long time.
The whispers of someone talking hits your ears but just as quickly disappears.
It is possible that you are not alone.  The sound of water dripping from
somewhere echoes in from the walls of the tunnel.  The tunnel through the
mountain continues to the north, east and west.

93.name: A Tunnel Through the Mountain
desc: "   The tunnel comes to an end in a hollow cave.  The tunnel is covered with
stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites grow up from the floor.  It is
obvious that this place has been here for a long time.  The sound of water
dripping from somewhere echoes in from the walls of the tunnel.  The
tunnel through the mountain continues to the west.

desc: "   The tunnel is covered with stalactites on the ceiling and stalagmites growing
up from the floor.  It is obvious that this place has been here a long time.
Some water drips down from the stalactites and falls into an underwater lake.
The lake looks large enough that you could dive in and take a look around.
You better be careful, you never know what is waiting in a lone reservoir.
The tunnel through the mountain continues to the east.

104.name: An Underwater Reservoir
desc: "   The underwater reservoir looks like it was once a large cave or den of some
large animal.  The cave was obviously flooded and is more than likely no longer
inhabited.  Or is it?  The underwater reservoir continues to the south and west.
The tunnel through the mountain can be found up after you emerge from the water.

105.name: An Underwater Reservoir
desc: "   The underwater reservoir looks like it was once a large cave or den of some
large animal.  The cave was obviously flooded and is more than likely no longer
inhabited.  Or is it?  The underwater reservoir continues to the east and south.

106.name: An Underwater Reservoir
desc: "   The underwater reservoir looks like it was once a large cave or den of some

107.name: An Underwater Reservoir
desc: "   The underwater reservoir looks like it was once a large cave or den of some
large animal.  The cave was obviously flooded and is more than likely no longer
inhabited.  Or is it?  The underwater reservoir continues to the north and east.

108.name: An Underwater Lake
desc: "   The lake is cool and completely serene.  It is impossible to see the
bottom of the lake in this darkness.  Even with a light source, the shadows
bouncing off jagged rocks conceal anyone or anything hiding in here.  A
quick movement in the corner of your eye startles you.  It looks like you
may not be alone after all.

109.name: Walking Through Ankle Deep Water
desc: "   The water instantly cools your feet through your boots as you walk through
the ankle deep shore.  The remnants of once wild and foaming waves gently
slap against your legs.  You can see that the waves in much deeper water
are rough and would probably roll you over.  It would be wise to be careful
in open water.  The shoreline of the Oldport beach lies directly to the north.

117.name: Wading Through the Water
desc: "   The ocean water in this area is about four feet deep.  An average size person
would be up to their chest in the water if they stood on the ocean floor.  It
is not easy to walk through this area of the water.  The small waves coming in
from the open water sometimes crash into your head, knocking your footing
asunder.  The shoreline of the Oldport beach is just a little further to the
north.  The open sea of the ocean surrounding Pharsica lies directly to the
south.  You can wade through the waters to your west and east without too much
trouble.

desc: "   The ocean water in this area is about four feet deep.  An average size person
would be up to their chest in the water if they stood on the ocean floor.  It
is not easy to walk through this area of the water.  The small waves coming in
from the open water sometimes crash into your head, knocking your footing
asunder.  The shoreline of the Oldport beach is just a little further to the
northeast.  The sea is much too rough to the north and west to wade any further.
The open sea of the ocean surrounding Pharsica can be swum through to the south.
You can wade through the waters to the east without too much trouble.

126.name: Wading Through the Water
desc: "   The ocean water in this area is about four feet deep.  An average size person
would be up to their chest in the water if they stood on the ocean floor.  It
is not easy to walk through this area of the water.  The small waves coming in
from the open water sometimes crash into your head, knocking your footing
asunder.  The shoreline of the Oldport beach is just a little further to the
northwest.  The sea is much too rough to the east and north to wade any further.
The open sea of the ocean surrounding Pharsica can be swum through to the south.
You can wade through the waters to the west without too much trouble.

127.name: Out Over Open Water
desc: "   The beach of Oldport is a good distance to the north from here.  The only
way you know the beach is there is the gigantic cliffs behind the beach are
poking up above the horizon.  You can see the walls surrounding the city of
Oldport very clearly from here.  The waves on the open water are getting
rougher and larger.  Crashing against you, the white crested waves almost
force you to fall into the blue water below.  Looking out to the ocean to
you west, it seems to go out forever.  There are no land masses in sight.
The ocean is far too rough to the east and south to go in those directions.

desc: "   The beach of Oldport is a good distance to the north from here.  The only

rougher and larger.  Crashing against you, the white crested waves almost
force you to fall into the blue water below.  Looking out over the ocean

land masses in sight!

137.name: Out Over Open Water
desc: "   The ocean surrounding the island of Pharsica spans out apparently forever.  You
cannot see any land masses in any direction.  The only ends to the ocean
appears to be the waiting horizons.  The waves on the open water are getting
rougher and larger.  Crashing into you in an explosion, the white crested
waves almost force you to fall into the blue water below.  The ocean continues
to the north, west and south.  The waves look entirely too dangerous to go
any further to the east.

165.name: Swimming Through the Water
desc: "   The water is very serene and clear today.  You can see several fish swimming
and people snorkeling all throughout the water.  The fish come up so close to
you that you can practically touch them!  They must be used to this kind of
traffic.  The bottom of the ocean leading up to the shoreline is directly to
the north.  The top of the ocean can be found directly above you.  You can
also swim out deeper into the ocean to the south and west.  The ocean current
is too strong to swim any further to the east.

175.name: Swimming Through the Water
desc: "   The water is very serene and clear today.  You can see several fish of
different sizes and colors swimming all throughout the water.  There are
also several people snorkeling all along the ocean floor.  They must be
making their way down to the coral reef.  The bottom of the ocean leading
up to the shoreline of the Oldport beach can be found a little further to
the north.  There is light filtering down from the sun beaming high above.
The waves must be too rough because you can not seem to break the surface
of the water.  You can also swim deeper into the ocean to the west, north,
south and down.  The ocean's currents are just too strong to swim any
further to the east.

195.name: Swimming Through the Water
desc: "   The water is very serene and clear today.  You can see several fish of
different sizes and colors swimming all throughout the water.  There are
also several people snorkeling all along the ocean floor.  They must be
making their way down to the coral reef.  There is light filtering down

ocean by emerging through the water above your head.  You can also swim
deeper into the ocean to the north, west and down.  The ocean currents

colors of the animals and plants all along the reef stick out beautifully.

205.name: Deep Under the Water
desc: "   The water at this level of the ocean is darker than above, but it is still
very serene and clear.  The bottom of the ocean leading up to the shoreline
is directly beneath you and moves towards the north.  Looking around, you can
see several different kinds of fish, varying in size and color.  They are all
quite beautiful as they swim through the water.  You can also see several beach
goer's snorkeling through the water.  They must either be returning from or
heading to the coral reef to the far south.  The ocean currents are far too
dangerous to swim any further to the east.  You may continue to swim through
the ocean to the west, south and up.

225.name: Deep Under the Water
desc: "   The water at this level of the ocean is darker than above, but it is
still very serene and clear.  You cannot even see the shoreline of the
Oldport beach from here.  No matter which way you look you can only see
open water of the ocean surrounding Pharsica.  Looking around, you can
see several different kinds of fish, varying in size and color.  They
are all quite beautiful as they swim through the water.  You can also see
many beach goer's snorkeling around the coral reef below.  The ocean
currents are far too dangerous to swim any further to the east and south.
You may continue to swim through the ocean to the north, west, up and down.

235.name: Along the Coral Reef
desc: "   The coral reef at the bottom of the ocean is one of the mostly lovely
sights you have ever seen.  There is beautifully colored color and sea
anemone rooted all over the rocks of the reef.  You can see different
colored fishes or various sizes and shapes darting in and out of the
reef like a playground.  They really seem to be enjoying themselves in
their natural habitat.  You can see several other beach goer's snorkeling
down here with you, enjoying the coral reef.  You can continue along the
coral reef to the west and south.  The expansive ocean surrounding
Pharsica continues upward.

255.name: Caught in the Current
desc: "   The ocean current tosses and turns you around.  It is difficult to tell
exactly where you are going.  It feels like the current is not too difficult
to swim to in the northern and eastern directions.  Maybe you should swim
a little further to find out!

256.name: Caught in the Current
desc: "   The ocean current tosses and turns you around.  It is difficult to tell
exactly where you are going.  It feels like the current is not too difficult
to swim to in the northern and western directions.  Maybe you should swim
a little further to find out!

257.name: Caught in the Current
desc: "   The ocean current tosses and turns you around.  It is difficult to tell
exactly where you are going.  It feels like the current is not too difficult
to swim to in the eastern and southern directions.  Maybe you should swim
a little further to find out!

258.name: Caught in the Current
desc: "   The ocean currents are even stronger in this room.  It feels like you are
being pulled deeper into the sea.  It is difficult to tell exactly where you
are doing.  It feels like the current is not too difficult to swim to in the
western and southern directions.  However, you feel that you should stay in
this place for some reason.

extra.desc: The current grabs you from behind and starts to whip you through the water.

259.name: Lost in the Currents
desc: "   Panic is starting to set in as the current whips you around.  You cannot
seem to escape its strong embrace as it successfully holds you in place.  Just
as you are losing your mind, the current quickly grabs you and pulls you
further through the ocean.

extra.desc: The current grabs you from behind and starts to whip you through the water.

as you are losing your mind, the current quickly grabs you and pulls you
further through the ocean.

extra.desc: The current grabs you from behind and starts to whip you through the water.

266.name: Lost in the Currents
desc: "   Panic is starting to set in as the current whips you around.  You cannot
seem to escape its strong embrace as it successfully holds you in place.  Just
as you are losing your mind, the current quickly grabs you and pulls you
further through the ocean.

extra.desc: The current shoots you up and out of the water, crashing onto the sandy beach.
